pkgmetadata.longdescription: # compas_invocations[![pypi](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/compas_invocations.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/compas-invocations/)A collection of reusable pyinvoke tasks## UsageImport and add tasks to a collection in your project's `tasks.py` file: import os from invoke import Collection from compas_invocations import style ns = Collection(style.check, style.lint) ns.configure( { "base_folder": os.path.dirname(__file__), } )For a more complete example, check the [`tasks.py`](tasks.py) of this project.
